title: Gay as Mardi Gras
description: After the demise of his relationship with his childhood sweetheart, Janey, Jesse needs to get away. His nan has just the a month-long cruise around Hawaii and the Pacific Islands. It seems perfect—until Jesse realizes what kind of cruise it is. A gay cruise. Since Jesse’s roommate, Daniel, is recovering from a broken heart, the two decide to buddy up. They hit it off, and with Daniel now Jesse's partner in crime, they explore the boat and participate in all the fun activities on offer—with some, ah, interesting results for straight boy Jesse.
author: Lily Velden
